segments.text: All right , Mr . Crane , when will you be arriving in the city ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I should be coming in on the 11:30 mooring flight . How far is the office from the airport ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Only 25 minutes or so . We ’ ll send somebody to meet you . That ’ s 11:30 a . m . Friday the 15th ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s right . I ’ ll be in the baggage area .
segments.speaker: S2
